content.rendered:
[blank_spacer height=”65px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block title=”Who we are” pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”]

Sciemetric is a pioneer of Industry 4.0 smart technologies used by industrial organizations to optimize yield, boost quality and reduce costs. The company has worked in measurement and data management for over 35 years. The breadth and depth of Sciemetric’s expertise is unique, and the result of walking thousands of manufacturing lines, creating hundreds of applications and installing thousands of systems worldwide. Sciemetric’s technology is used around the world to gain data-driven insight into manufacturing quality and productivity, by companies such as Ford, Hewlett-Packard, Jaguar Land Rover, Caterpillar, Honda, John Deere and Cummins.

[/spb_text_block] [spb_accordion widget_title=”More about us” width=”1/3″] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Technologies” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • In-Process Test and Monitoring Solutions
  • Data Acquisition Systems
  • Turnkey Test Stations
  • Data Collection and Management Software
  • Manufacturing Analytics Software
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Major Markets Served” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
  • Automotive components and powertrain
  • Off-highway components and powertrain
  • Medical devices
  • Industrial automation integrators
  • Industrial manufacturers
  • Consumer products
[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Contact” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
